issue.title: [C++] Implement Rank kernel on chunked arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16707](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16707). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In ARROW-16234 the rank kernel was implemented for plain arrays, it should also be implemented for chunked arrays.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16707?focusedCommentId=17544929) by Will Ayd (willayd):*
I'll take this one

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16707?focusedCommentId=17617223) by Apache Arrow JIRA Bot (arrowjira):*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned per [project policy](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/developers/bug_reports.html#issue-assignment). Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
